website_summaries.verdict: A comfortable oven glove that protects users from accidental burns and comes in a pack of two.
pros: The glove is machine washable and withstands temperatures up to 540º F. Made of flame and heat resistant materials so it won't catch fire
Non-slip design makes it easy to safely handle hot pots and casseroles
Silicon grips cover the fingers and palms
cons: Not waterproof so beware of steam

customer_reviews.title: FAKE ITEM!
customer_reviews.text: I received 2 of these gloves today and believe they are 100% FAKES. There is NO tag, NO registration or instruction sheets..The bar code was covered and is NOT what the original glove was. I've read that people have been burned using these fakes. I have very small hands and have to fight to put them on. Not sure who I can contact but I want my money back and should NOT have to pay to send these FAKES back!! As they say, "a bargain isn't always a bargain"! This is the 2nd item from my last two Amazon orders that items were not as advertised. Come on Amazon..If I wanted fakes I'd go back to Ebay!
customer_reviews.author: velvet

customer_reviews.title: COUNTERFEIT product.  Do not buy.
customer_reviews.text: We own other ove gloves and the one we received is definitely a fake. The box is full of spelling errors that tipped me off that this wasn't the real deal.. The glove doesn't have the same shape/elasticity as the real one we have. I should have read the reviews but was misled since it said Amazon's Choice on the listing. Real ove gloves are fantastic, wasn't going to take chances with this fake one.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: This feels like a counterfeit! See my uploaded picture.
customer_reviews.text: I bought item "Ove' Glove Hot Surface Handler, 1 Glove (Pack of 2)" from Amazon last year. Was so pleased, I came back to get another. I accidentally ordered this one named "Joseph Enterprises HH501-18 Ove Glove - As Seen On TV". Received it today via China post from an address in China (about 9 days later). Right away I noticed the glove felt thinner and lighter than what I bought last year. I weighed the two and there was a significant difference. 111grams vs 84grams. I have no proof this is counterfeit, but I'm reluctant to use this product in high heat situations to protect myself. See my uploaded image of the side by side comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Dog

customer_reviews.title: Its a fake
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I thought it was the real deal. No label and fits snugger than my original. The blue grips are more plastic feeling. Using this as my other hand glove so will see how well it holds up. Disappointed as I thought all the fakes were gone.
customer_reviews.author: BuffyB

customer_reviews.title: Not real
customer_reviews.text: This is a second to match my first one and it is not the same. The tag looks fake and so does everything else about it. I threw away my packaging but this is not a “real” Ove glove.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!! Read before purchasing.
customer_reviews.text: Not as advertised. This glove is a knock-off (imitation) and not a genuine manufacture product. Go to the genuine "Ove Glove" web site and see the differences in the glove and packaging. There are also video's from other customers who show ways to distinguish the differences between the knock-off and the real glove. The performance of the imitation glove is very poor.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Klecanda

customer_reviews.title: Not an Ove Glove
customer_reviews.text: This is not the original Ove Glove like pictured on Amazon, but a cheap Chinese knockoff. I have an original Ove Glove and it is much more substantial than this piece of garbage. I took a hot tray out of the oven with the original Ove Glove, and it was hot enough for me to put it down in less than 25 seconds. Had I used this imposter, I would most likely have burned my hand, or dropped the fresh biscuits that I was pulling out of the oven. Buyer beware: This is NOT an OveGlove. I don't trust this thin imitation. Spend a little more and get the original.
customer_reviews.author: gearjammer

customer_reviews.title: Knock-off - DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on this item! This "glove" is a knock -off of the real Ove Glove. Shame on you Amazon for allowing this seller to use your name and your site for this substandard item, promoting itself as the real deal !!!! Hopefully Amazon you do not condone misleading advertising :(
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Mac

customer_reviews.title: Terrible heatproofing
customer_reviews.text: My own fault, but note this product is *ONE* glove. Who the heck buys 1 glove and not a set?! Aside from that, the heatproofing is terrible. I've owned several similar gloves which allow me to grab cast iron on a campfire, but this glove feels hot even after a cookie sheet for literally seconds. Don't buy this one, folks! Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Aless

customer_reviews.title: Not the Ove Glove of Old
customer_reviews.text: I think someone must have bought the rights to the Ove Glove, then cheapened the design. They are not very heat resistant, as even a 350 degree cookie sheet penetrates the glove rather quickly. The stitching seems cheap, and starts to fray too early in the life of the glove. Forget about washing these things - they shrink, stay wet inside, and generally don't clean up well in the wash anyway. Sized too small for most American hands, so not great for most average-sized male hands. Would not recommend these any more.
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: These gloves help the cook
customer_reviews.text: These gloves help the cook move through the important timing of cooking with ease and without burning your hands. A simple task like making spaghetti can go more quickly without the need to tip toe around the hot pan. The same for preparing chicken in the oven where timing is critical to the overall taste of the finished product. It also helps the cook to be more sure footed about timing for flavor especially for the chicken. Try them, they are a wonderful investment for both hands.
customer_reviews.author: charliebargain

customer_reviews.title: The real deal
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews and discovering there were numerous fakes out there, I researched this carefully before buying two of these. One for my husband and me to use and the second one for my granddaughter who is eager to take on more responsibility in the kitchen. They are the real deal and they work great. My husband is protected from the grill heat. My granddaughter is confident when taking things out of the oven. I can hold hot pans directly for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: CarolB

customer_reviews.title: as good as before
customer_reviews.text: This is the second ove glove I've purchased. Watched husband take something out of the oven with one ove glove and a pot holder. Awkward. Bought a second one and now its much easier to remove hot items from the oven, plus no burns on back of the hand, fingers or wrist. Very happy with it. I use the gloves for removing bread container out of a bread machine, no accidently burning my fingers. FYI. Washed the old ove glove by hand, it took several days to completely dry as they are very heavy, but it looks as good as new. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: char

customer_reviews.title: Quality has gone down
customer_reviews.text: I purchased an Ove glove several years ago and still have it and its in great condition. This most recent one I purchased was supposed to be the same size but is smaller. I use cast iron pans for roasting and that can be 400 degrees at times. With the older glove I can hold the handle and have no heat issue. Sadly the new one I get about 5 seconds and its coming right thru the glove. It just isn't what it used to be I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Peter McNeely

customer_reviews.title: Ove Glove is AWESOME!  I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is much safer and easier to use than a pot holder when taking hot pans out of an oven. I liked mine so much that I've given some as gifts to my son, mother, brother, and recommended them to others. Since it is a glove, it not only protects the top and bottom of the hands, but also a bit of the wrist. Plus, there is more dexterity with these than with a typical oven mitt and I have not yet encountered any 'thin' spots like with oven mitts. I now use only Ove Gloves for handling hot items from the oven. .
customer_reviews.author: R.S.

customer_reviews.title: So much better than oven mits
customer_reviews.text: Why use an oven mitt when you can use a glove? It is easier to hold baking dishes or oven utensils with a thin, but insulating glove than it is to use those bulky oven mitts. I can never go back. The only problem is that my dog thinks they are chew toys so I must store them out of her reach.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: basic overview
customer_reviews.text: worked great. I have had this for about 6 months. I have not yet washed it so idk how that will go. It has great grip there is nothing worse than trying to get a huge hot pan of lasagna out of the oven and you just can grip it. Definitely heat proof you can barely feel the warmth ive even put it to the test by putting my hand directly on a burner and it was only warm to the touch. as as far s heat resistance i would give it 5 stars most definitely gripping ability also 5 stars. i have only owned it 6 months so as far as long term wear and tear i cant say.
customer_reviews.author: Arija

customer_reviews.title: Geat Product - Have used for years
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product that I have been gifted for years. Decided I needed a new pair and gave my old pair to the hubbie for grilling. Easy to clean. Wash and hang dry. But what I have noticed with this pair the heat tolerance isn't as good as my previous pair. I have noticed now there are other manufactures that have a higher heat tolerance as well. Occasionally have had a issue with grasping pans at 400-425 degrees. May switch brands at a later time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor heat resistance
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are not very versatile. They're pretty much just cloth, so they're porous, and they offer no protection from liquids or steam. They're not particularly good for solid objects either--you'll usually feel some heat. In fact, I can breathe on these and feel my breath through them. These might be OK for some uses, but they're not useful for ovens.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: They are fine, EXCEPT
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 2 of these for my kitchen and several for other family members. They are fine, EXCEPT, that I believe that whoever created the silicon strip design on the gloves never took a hot skillet or a hot pan out of an oven. They really need a silicone strip on the inside of the thumb along that seam and a matching strip on the edge of the palm toward the end of the pointer finger. That's where the hot pans actually touch.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Davis

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: As expected the Ove Glove didn't disappoint, have been using them over the years for gifts and they are always a hit. I have had my pair for over 10 years and was beginning to feel the heat a bit so figured it was time to replace. I really don't what I would do if I didn't have the Ove Glove to rely on since Oven Mitts don't fit me and I'm not crazy about pot holders.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Merry

customer_reviews.title: Best Oven Mitt
customer_reviews.text: Love this glove so much I have one for each hand. Only drawback is cleaning it. Can't wash it so need to spot clean. I can reach right into oven and grab a hot pan without getting burned and it is not awkward like other oven mits.
customer_reviews.author: densnake

customer_reviews.title: Works well. So far so good. Fits well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two different types of oven gloves on Amazon. These fit better than the other brand. My hands are on the smaller side. So far so good. Heat resistant. I haven’t tried cleaning them yet. Best amazon prime day purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tina H.

customer_reviews.title: Glove is huge and bulky
customer_reviews.text: I haven't the gloves yet. I tried them on and found them much too large for comfort and use of use. I have medium sized hands, but the fingers of the gloves were approximately 3/4" oc an inch longer, Not made for women's hands. Wish they came in small and medium sizes. Will return.
customer_reviews.author: LUCIA BENNETT

customer_reviews.title: Glove was ok
customer_reviews.text: I did not like that you only receive one glove. What are you supposed to do when you are lifting a 9 x 13 pan with one hand. Price was too much for just one glove. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou Sansone

customer_reviews.title: Must be sized for a hobbit....
customer_reviews.text: Way to small. I have an average size male's hands and this glove does not slide on easily. So now I'm trying to figure out which of my friends has hands this small....Also the delivery driver left this package on my walkway in the rain, when with a few more steps it could have been left dry on my porch.
customer_reviews.author: R Scott Wagman

customer_reviews.title: New glove too big
customer_reviews.text: I received one of your gloves 20 years ago and just loved it because it fit my hand very well. The new one is almost identical but the fingers are bigger even though it is the same size. Otherwise the glove does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Molly Hofacre

customer_reviews.title: Heat
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift from my brother to my husband. He used it frequently with no problems. Then we got puppies that eventually grew tall enough to steal stuff off the counter. Had to buy him a new one. Good quality. Works great. Definitely a must have.
customer_reviews.author: mshell

customer_reviews.title: Just what's needed to handle hot cookware in the kitchen or BBQ
customer_reviews.text: This glove, like the two others that I have (one with a finger shredded by something in my smoker) is just great. That is, if you have relatively large hands. I wear extra-large dress gloves and Ove Gloves fit my hands with a little room to spare. Ove Gloves machine wash well but take a long time to dry. With the slilcone stripes that Ove Gloe added years ago, handling hot items can be done without the risk of something slipping out of your hand. These gloves are relatively expensive but if you avoid klutzy handling of hot smoker parts, they can be expected to last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Rollin

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME gloves!!
customer_reviews.text: These are actually my SECOND pair of these gloves. I use these EVERY DAY!! The only reason I bought this current pair is because my old ones (which I had for YEARS) got so dirty from daily use they became kind of gross (not because they wore out.) They take a long time to dry when washed, so lazy me never seemed to get organized enough to allow enough drying time between uses, especially since I use them every day and could not bear to part with them long enough for them to be washed and properly dried. Consequently, they got rather soiled. Hmmm, maybe I should get yet another pair?? YES!! Good idea!!
customer_reviews.author: Cherries

customer_reviews.title: LOVE the glove!
customer_reviews.text: I have decorative gloves, then I have this one. I love having the use of all my fingers when I’m pulling dishes out of the oven. Can’t feel the heat and I don’t feel like I’m going to drop my food.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Oven Mitts
customer_reviews.text: This have worked amazingly so far. I love being able to not use oven mitts and instead gloves to get hot pans out of the oven. I’m defintely going to buy one for each hand! The only thing I don’t like is that it’s white, so stains are going to be seen easily if not washed off right away.
customer_reviews.author: AOD Legend

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well!
customer_reviews.text: These are sooo cool literally lol protects your hands from burning! Easy to wash and holds up well in the wash! This is my 3rd one in 10 years!
customer_reviews.author: Nc2bkneaded

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have small hands and these are a little large. However, I am delighted with them. I bought two of them and I am ready to throw out all of my old hot pads. These are so great to slide on to lift a pan out of the oven. I am extremely satisfied. I love to cook and spend as much time as possible in the kitchen. I don't know how I ever got along without these!! I plan to order more for gifts!
customer_reviews.author: loves to read

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Much easier to handle hot dishes from oven than any other type of potholder. Used them for years and have bought for gifts, good for those who grill too.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Nice oven mitt
customer_reviews.text: I bought two, so I could use one for each hand. When taking something out of the oven, I can feel a little heat through the glove but overall I'm glad I purchased these.
customer_reviews.author: Window

customer_reviews.title: Great product.  Well worth the purchase price.
customer_reviews.text: These might be the best thing since sliced bread. I have threatened my husband with cruel and unusual punishment should they disappear from the kitchen into the shop, LOL. Having a bit of arthritis and having to use both hands to safely lift heavy items, I bought two of these. The grip allows for confident lifting. Check the instructions for the temperature it says they are good up to - it's pretty high but double-check to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: Annie M daffodils

customer_reviews.title: Much better than an standard oven mit
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 pairs of these, one for the kitchen and one for the grill. It is flexible enough that you can even chop/dice with it on. A must have for grilling.
customer_reviews.author: jd

customer_reviews.title: Ove' Gloves ROCK
customer_reviews.text: The Ove' Gloves are a must for any kitchen--absolute MUST!!! I don't even have hot pads or other various tools to assist with hot surfaces, as these gloves are literally handle all my needs. They hold up quite well over time, as my mother still has a pair that have been used heavily over the years, and now I have my own! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Love the Ove Glove
customer_reviews.text: The ove glove has always been my favorite and works amazing. I never feel heat come through when taking things out of the oven or using it with hot handles, etc.
customer_reviews.author: kjhart31

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure it does a great job.
customer_reviews.text: These serve their purpose, but there are just as good, if not better, cheaper alternatives out there.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Newcomer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! We have used our original for a couple years and decided to get a second. Hands down best hot mit
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Still the one
customer_reviews.text: My wife wanted a new Ove Glove after hers was lost at a community event. She searched unsuccessfully in stores, so I bought her two on Amazon. She was happy to receive them and pleased that the gloves were still well made and as convenient to use as ever.
customer_reviews.author: Mantz

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Best!
customer_reviews.text: We have used these for years. They are the absolute best pot holders out there. They are not bulky and last forever. This order was not to replace the ones I’ve been using daily for 15 years, but for a family member just starting out.
customer_reviews.author: Avalon

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: 2 of my children are blind, however, very independent. The thought of them sticking their hands into a hot oven without seeing where the item they’re pulling out is, concerned me. Using a flimsy hot pad or oven mitt just wasn’t practical. The Ove Glove isn’t flimsy. Every inch protects their hands. This allows them (and me) peace of mind!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa B.

customer_reviews.title: ... as a gift and it is hands down the best! I had to buy myself a second one ...
customer_reviews.text: I am not one for buying as seen on TV products but I received one of these as a gift and it is hands down the best! I had to buy myself a second one and I have given them as gifts. It works great at keeping my hands cool and makes it so much easier to move things in and out of my oven.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Invincible...to hot pans
customer_reviews.text: With the Ove Glove, you feel like a superhero, if that superhero's only power was being able to take hot things out of an oven. It's not bulky and awkward like an oven mitt. You still have dexterity and movement, and can take a victory lap around the kitchen carrying your freshly roasted brussels sprouts without suffering nasty third degree burns!
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: and much to my disappointment I realized I had lost or misplaced my original ...
customer_reviews.text: A must have in the kitchen. We recently moved, and much to my disappointment I realized I had lost or misplaced my original Ove' gloves in the process. I immediately ordered a replacement pair. I love these gloves! So easy to grip hot pans, baking sheets, etc. They fit either hand, so you don't have to think about which one you're using. I definitely recommend. Great for a bridal shower or Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: LovindaUP

customer_reviews.title: Still be leery of holding high heat objects too long
customer_reviews.text: I love this oven mitt. My mother bought it for me since I had just burnt my hand badly for the second time using pans in the oven. It is not superman though, I took a pan out of a 475 degree oven and could feel an uncomfortable heat from the handle leaking through the glove just from taking the pan from oven to stove top. But for grabbing those hard to hold baking sheets and pie pans it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Elou

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ITEM
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE COOL! (NO PUN INTENDED) BOUGHT TWO, SO I CAN USE BOTH HANDS, PROTECTED. LOVE THEM.
customer_reviews.author: MICHIGAN

customer_reviews.title: The only oven mitt I use
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of these and have had them for years. They are the best oven mitt ever. The glove allows you to grab things and not have your hand or fingers hindered like traditional oven mitts. I can grab a hot skillet out of the oven with a good grip and never worry about getting burned.
customer_reviews.author: mcbonhamdog

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof but just fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: These things are great. I recommend getting the pair. I gave a pair to my brother-in-law for Christmas. He loves 'em.
customer_reviews.author: Sdub

customer_reviews.title: A must have for the kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for handling hot dishes out of the oven. With the grip on them, you never have to worry about a dish slipping or getting burnt. I wouldn't be without them now and feel every kitchen should have two. I also like that I can wash them in the washer and then hang them to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Grama F

customer_reviews.title: Best thing in the world
customer_reviews.text: I use these on a daily basis and I’ve given them to all of my family members.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Perfect affordable kitchen addition
customer_reviews.text: buy 2 or 3, and keep them. Much more flexible than old style "mitts" with a thumb and a mitten. The fact you can articulate your fingers is great. Hard to explain, but the first dish you move with these, you'll understand it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: My husband uses this glove when he grills. He loves the heat protection and flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Good but not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these gloves after sustaining a burned thumb taking something out of the oven with traditional pot holders. These are certainly improvement over potholders, but not quite as good as I expected. On my first use I took a very hot baking dish out of the oven and was impressed at first that I felt no heat at all. But by the time I made the 10 second trip to the kitchen table, I could feel the heat of the dish coming through the gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Tony

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easier to grab hot things with than potholders
customer_reviews.text: My mother loves her Ove Glove!" She wanted a second. Needs another because the new dog seems to love the Ove Glove too🙄
customer_reviews.author: tracy thilberg

customer_reviews.title: just so useful! You can't hold anything for a super long ...
customer_reviews.text: I will always have these in my kitchen, just so useful! You can't hold anything for a super long time, but so much easier for getting things out of the oven, or cooking with cast iron fry pans where the handles get really warm. I drop less stuff coming out of the over than I do with standard pot holders since you can more easily correct your hand placement if anything starts to slip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fake! Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are counterfeit ove gloves! I burned my finger taking a pan of roast veggies out of the oven. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: LaurieMae

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves. I purchase two of these gloves for both of my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent P Maher Jr

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This product should have come with two gloves instead of just one which is a huge disappointment
customer_reviews.author: Scott brandt

customer_reviews.title: ... expected white stitching around the cuff instead of blue like it showed on the original one
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected white stitching around the cuff instead of blue like it showed on the original one. Also it gets hot between the thumb and the first finger where you can feel the heat. Where is the original one made? Mine was made in S Korea.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald C Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Love the Ove Glove
customer_reviews.text: The original Ove Glove is the ONLY one you'll want to purchase. Don't fall for any imitation or copy-cat glove. These gloves protect your hands from burns in so many applications: baking, grilling, changing hot light bulbs, even removing logs that are still warm from the fireplace.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy in TN

customer_reviews.title: These are great!
customer_reviews.text: We finally had to replace our original Ove' gloves with a new pair. While our others still worked, they were showing some wear after more than a decade's worth of use. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Diane K. Chaplin

customer_reviews.title: There are better products available
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't as amazing as I had hoped. No protection from steam - in fact it actually traps steam. Fairly difficult to get clean.
customer_reviews.author: Tressa

customer_reviews.title: buy the one with amazon prime, that sells two gloves for 22$
customer_reviews.text: the one that is sold single for under 10$ is the Chinese knock off and Amazon should no have this item sold as knock off, nor display it in the first place of the search function. item before purchase should display how long it takes to deliver, for this item fail to show it, and it takes 2 months delivery. not to buy. seller keeps changing name. buy from Amazon warehouse only
customer_reviews.author: A. Devitt

customer_reviews.title: Using for heat set paints and doll making :)
customer_reviews.text: These are great for using with Genesis heat set paints and doll making as I don't have room for a free-standing convection oven. I needed something to protect my hands from the heat gun/tool to cure the paints, and these are perfect (got two). I can still move my fingers as needed, but get the protection - I heat/set one end and then turn the limb or head around to do the other end- no burns :)
customer_reviews.author: JillinoisRNTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: These work amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My hubby received one of these as more of a joke from a friend... well... we both fell in love with it and just bought a second one! They fit so well and you can do much more with this glove on your hand instead of a big clunky oven mitt! I highly recommend these and they wash up great!
customer_reviews.author: M.E.K.

customer_reviews.title: This product is fantastic. We purchased this Ove' Glove to replace one ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is fantastic. We purchased this Ove' Glove to replace one that we had purchased four years ago. We can pick up a cast iron skillet that has been in a 400 degree oven for 45 minutes and not feel any heat on our hand whatsoever. You will thank yourself for purchasing this product. The rubber grips prevent pots and pans from slipping from you hand.
customer_reviews.author: James J. Gorski

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love
customer_reviews.text: I would search hi and low for these gloves. When I'm wearing them, I don't think twice about grabbing a hot pot or pan. I have given so many of these as gifts, especially to my relatives in Italy and they love them. The only thing you need to worry about is if it gets wet while you're holding a hot item as the steam could burn you.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Schauer

customer_reviews.title: How did I live before this?
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea how I was living before I bought this or why I waited so long to try it. I highly recommend them to all my friends. Why on Earth is anyone using oven mitts???????
customer_reviews.author: Shauna L Yorty

customer_reviews.title: Best oven mitt ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the third Ove Glove I've owned; they don't last forever. But they do last a long time and are the best oven mitt I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: KSSeaBird

customer_reviews.title: Best oven mitt!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best oven mitt ever. We use ours for everything. We like it so much we often give a pair of these as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A regular old pot holder works better than this
customer_reviews.text: Meh. This is just okay. Hold a hot pan for a couple seconds too long and consider your hand burned. Learned the hard way. A regular old pot holder works better than this, and way less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna S.

customer_reviews.title: Ove Glove
customer_reviews.text: Okay product but can not withstand extreme temps out of the oven. I could feel the heat immediately taking a glass baking dish out of the oven.
customer_reviews.author: LauraJean Farrar

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my mother to wear when she deseeds avocados. Of course, it also is heat resistant and I love my two Ove Gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's the only thing I use!
customer_reviews.text: This purchase was for a replacement. My old one was really old and a bit grungy looking. I use this all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict in the making!

customer_reviews.title: Ove Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Like the pair of ove gloves over my old one. These have grippers throughout the glove that doesn't allow things to slip from your hands. However, these gloves have a tighter wrist opening that takes getting use to. Also be sure you find ones shipping from the U.S. I didn't realize these were shipping from China and they took 5 weeks to get here. Wouldn't do that again.
customer_reviews.author: V. A. Haggerty

customer_reviews.title: Love these things
customer_reviews.text: Work great in the kitchen. I do not believe they would work well for charcoal grills. Get welders glove for grill use.
customer_reviews.author: Grumpy Hummingbird

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Not that heat resistant. Took crock from oven at 350 degrees and could feel heat through glove.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish they came in sizes
customer_reviews.text: They work to protect against the heat of an oven or hot tray but they are one size fits mosts and I find them bulky on my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great, a little big if you have small hands
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say here...I use it almost every day. It's a little big, I have very large hands, usually I have to wear XXL or XXXL gloves, and these fit perfect, though, my girlfriend who is 5ft-nothin, they are quite big on her, but she says it still works great.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and useful product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my "As Seen on TV" product-loving son and ended up keeping it for myself. I have used it to remove very hot items, and it is superior to a regular pot holder. You can hold the hot item for a longer period of time, such as bringing it to a dining room or making room for it on the counter, and you will not get burned.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love this oven mitt
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my sister for one of her Xmas presents and I personally love the way you can easily take stuff out of the oven!
customer_reviews.author: Whitejk

customer_reviews.title: Does what it was meant to do
customer_reviews.text: Does what its supposed to do just wish there had been a set unstead of just one
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Received Knock-offs
customer_reviews.text: After extensive research, unfortunately I received two knock-off Ove' Gloves. The fingers are very small and barely fit my hand, the wrist cuffs are small, neither had a tag attached (which authentic Ove' Gloves have), and the gloves are thinner than my original Ove' Gloves. I don't know how to ensure the ordering of an authentic glove - maybe it's luck of the draw.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon N.

customer_reviews.title: Love this oven mitt!
customer_reviews.text: I was soooo excited to find this here online -- and really need to order another one. These are the best oven mitts I have ever owned and finally reached a point of needing to replace about a year ago but couldn't find them anywhere. Will be ordering a couple of back-ups to store away.
customer_reviews.author: N. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why people are saying that these are not authentic. I bought two of these gloves and they work perfectly. The Ove Gloves gives you a far better grip than traditional oven kits. The rubber grips are soft and pliable yet somehow are impervious to the high temperatures of the oven. The gloves stretch effectively so that one size fits most people.
customer_reviews.author: Robby D.

customer_reviews.title: Flexible and safe
customer_reviews.text: I've been using a silicone glove, which works great it's hard to grasp anything with it. I bought an Ove Glove for someone as a gift, then ordered one for myself. It's very flexible and it's easy to grasp things with it. Very glad I splurged. Don't use it while it's wet, though. Everything except a material like silicone will transfer heat through the water.
customer_reviews.author: Ajax

customer_reviews.title: Good oven mitt.
customer_reviews.text: Much easier to use than other oven mitts. Protects you from the heat. I bought two so I can use both hands to take things out.
customer_reviews.author: Swhitta23

customer_reviews.title: One of the few things you see on TV that actually works
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing and will last forever. Replaced our first after daily use for 10 years! Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: VitaminJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Forget the "thumb" oven mitts of the past... this product gives you a full five-fingered glove that protects your entire hand from the heat but still allows you the functionality of the God-given opposable thumbs that we are graced with. Trust me... after you've experienced the Ove Glove, you will NEVER go back to anything else!
customer_reviews.author: b.g.

customer_reviews.title: Not the real thing!
customer_reviews.text: I don't think this was a true "ove glove". My husband received an Ove Glove several years ago as a gift. It is great. However, this glove did not protect his hand from heat. I think it was a "knock-off". We threw it away. Too dangerous to use as an oven mitt. Really, it should get zero stars!
customer_reviews.author: Kate E

customer_reviews.title: These are great to use with the outdoor BBQ as well
customer_reviews.text: Important to get the real authentic Ove' Glove. If you see the location listed as China, they're fakes. Only order from a US based company so you get the real thing. These are great to use with the outdoor BBQ as well... you can just reach in and grab a hot rack to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott G. Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Don't settle for substitutes!
customer_reviews.text: My second glove ... One for the kitchen, one at the outdoor grill. Works as advertised & fits well. You'll hardly feel the heat when handling hot pans, grilling hardware, etc. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Knock off
customer_reviews.text: Beware - gloves from "LED Buster" are not real "Ove Gloves" They are knock offs. The trim is wrong, the font is wrong, the packaging is wrong, and the gloves smell horrible. They seem to handle some heat, but I would not trust them. Not worth returning so I just threw it out.
customer_reviews.author: albloch

customer_reviews.title: Heat Protection
customer_reviews.text: Great for taking hot pans off the grill or stove top or out of the oven. Good insulation for high heat.
customer_reviews.author: Jim M

customer_reviews.title: Can stain or burn if they touch food or a burner.
customer_reviews.text: Have saved me from burning my self on more than one occasion. I love them. Buy two not just one glove trust me.
customer_reviews.author: dedonfuego

customer_reviews.title: Wow! They really work as described!
customer_reviews.text: A little scary at first. You don't thing because it's a fairly lightweight glove that it's going to work well and you don't want to burn your hand. Guess what? They are amazing! No heat transfers at all. Used multiple times now in my oven at over 450f and they simply work! Easy to handle pans, etc. since they are not a mitt.
customer_reviews.author: TURBODRIVER24
